article: a soldier stationed at the fort drum army base in upstate new york and his wife were attacked by nearly a dozen fellow soldiers at the couple 's off-base apartment this week in retaliation for a restraining order the wife recently filed against another soldier , the authorities said friday .
abstract: ## soldiers face charges of attacking couple
